name: Sudoku Master: Classic Puzzle
description:
Welcome to the Sudoku Master: Classic Puzzle.

The Sudoku Master: Classic Puzzle has many well-designed puzzles with five different modes such as Easy, Normal, Hard. Expert, Master. This is a classic Sudoku game to help you keep your brain active. It’s great for both beginners and advanced players.

The painting style of the game is simple and clear. With this design, the player can find the position of the number faster.

There are many levels in the game, and we will update them regularly. If you encounter difficulties, you can also use props.

Other additional functions
1) Unlimited Undo: Did you make a mistake? Get it back fast!
2) Eraser: Eliminate all mistakes!
3) Note Mode: Turn on the note mode to take notes like a piece of paper.
4) Hint: Use the hints function when you are stuck.

Challenge your brain with Sudoku Master: Classic Puzzle anywhere, anytime!
